title: CD Bug
body: I have a cd problem. When i have a flash of cd. it starts on 260 instead of 300. it also works on items such as BORK and youmuus. Also long cd skills, Such as most ults on most champions.I have repaired the client

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=2OVud6vs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-13T06:06:56.622+0000)
>
> How's having lower cooldowns an **issue**?

When its cd is finished. It starts glowing showing that its done. But when i click on it, It doesnt do anything at all. So when im doing teamfights, sometimes i might dive in thinking that my flash is up. But instead i just dont do anything and get caught.
This happens all the time

Oh, I see. It's making you think that you have lower cool-downs when you don't. Do you have anything like Lolreplay or something installed? They can occasionally cause issues like this.

Anyway, this is a bug and thus should be posted in [the right board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
